author: Alex Lubben, Christina Sterbenz
title: The Pentagon Is Trying to Buy 50,000 Body Bags for People Expected to Die of Coronavirus​
description: Officially called “human remains pouches,” the body bags are designed for carrying dead soldiers off battlefields.
content:
Want the best of VICE News straight to your inbox? Sign up here.
 The Pentagon is seeking to supply 100,000 military-style body bags for the people expected to die of COVID-19.
